channel.title: Bounty hunter, adding the area and the arrow
channel.description:
Well, I want to add bounty hunter to my server, and I alrady have a target system and the penalty, but I do not have the bounty hunter arena in my server, can anybody give me the models and tell me how to add areas please? Also, does anyone knows how to let an arrow appear over the target.
My Server is Delta based.

item.title: Bounty hunter, adding the area and the arrow
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Ferity, post:4, topic:379823”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=475665.msg3478440#msg3478440 date=1295896908]
l2higherdeobthan317
[/quote]

This was a useless command and counts as spam…
Many players prefer 317 servers, so do I, accept that…

To add the maps thats client-sided, and to send the hint arrow, the method is already in your client class.

That didn’t help me much. =
Which method is it?
If I want to add the maps, in WHICH class do I have to add it?[/quote]
I prefer 317 deob, but you’re going to have to edit it client-side. If you ask in client help, I’m sure you’ll get more help there.

Read full topic
item.source: Bounty hunter, adding the area and the arrow
